```{r setup}
library(bioTools)
```

```{r cleanData}

data(phe);data(expr)
cleanData = clean(phe,expr)

```


```{r uniCox}
library(survival)
featureNames=sample(expr[,1],10)
uniCoxRes=NULL
for(i in featureNames){
  #i=featureNames[1]
  cox <- coxph(Surv(survivalTime,survivalStatus) ~ cleanData[,i], data = cleanData)
  coxSumm = summary(cox)
  uniCoxRes = rbind(uniCoxRes,c(i,simpleSummary(coxSumm)))
}

```
